listing.name: Reorder(able) Labels
listing.description:
This PowerUp allows you to **manage card’s labels from the powerup** OR **reorder Trello’s labels dropdown by re-mapping label colours** (colours dictate label order). You can also **“Find & Replace” one label with another** across all cards on the board.

Quick access to labels you always need - without multiple clicks and searching. Have labels in your preferred order.

‌

Try Reorder(able) Labels free for 7 days.

![1\*hZdGtxDZl93-q5KT8uKYrg.gif](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:4800/format:webp/1*hZdGtxDZl93-q5KT8uKYrg.gif)

## How to re-order native labels?

1. Set the labels in the preferred order.
2. Click “Propagate order to native labels“
3. Review (and edit) colour mapping.
4. Click ”Update label colours”.
5. Your native labels have been re-ordered using colour re-mapping.

![1\*d32sG97UvHg2pEZatPpO0g.gif](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1100/format:webp/1*d32sG97UvHg2pEZatPpO0g.gif)

## Popular ways to reorder labels.

- **Most used** - great if you have many old labels that show up at the top, but you no longer need to scroll to find the right one.
- **Order in which labels show up on the card** - As we all know, the labels show up in the [following order on the card](https://community.atlassian.com/forums/Trello-questions/Re-How-do-I-re-order-labels/qaq-p/2684022/comment-id/92712#M92712 "‌"), but native labels are ordered by date of creation. Reorderable Labels allow you to reorder labels in the order in which they will show up on your cards.

---

## Want to swap some labels?

Do you have some labels you created way back, and you no longer want them cluttering your labels list? Simply want to simplify and restructure your labels?

### Replace a label on all cards (even archived ones)

With Reorder(able) Labels, you can do it easily in 3 steps:

1. Pick a label you want to replace
2. Pick a label you want to use instead
3. Decide if you want to replace it only on visible cards or also on archived cards.
4. Perform replacement.

![1\*5E-JhYi4yukCtfV7br5lnQ.gif](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:4800/format:webp/1*5E-JhYi4yukCtfV7br5lnQ.gif)

---

## Reorder(able) Labels enable you to…

‌

- Spend less time looking for your labels
- Order labels the way you want
- Quickly swap labels on all cards
- De-clutter your labels list

---

## Pricing: Free trial → cost of a cheap lunch

We’re not free, but we’re not expensive either. After the free trial expires, we offer a yearly subscription for the price of **one cheap lunch, aka. 10€ + VAT / year.**

---

## FAQ

**Shouldn't the powerup help me reorder the native Labels from Trello?**

Unfortunately, it is not possible to reorder the labels in the native Trello Labels dropdown to my knowledge (even by leveraging my PowerUp).

The intended use of this PowerUp right now is to use it INSTEAD of the native Labels.

The new Trello UI adds 1 more click to accessing Reorderable Labels, so this will make the PowerUp less convenient (in the old Trello UI, it is at least the same number of clicks as native Labels), but I still find it useful, and I hope you will as well.

---

## Support when you need it

If you need help with anything, email me at [saso@sasojakljevic.com](mailto:saso@sasojakljevic.com "‌"). I’ll respond quickly and help any way I can.

> Less annoyance, more enjoyment using labels in Trello.

## We protect your data

We’re committed to managing your data securely and transparently. We do not store any of your content — in fact, we never even see it. We will never share your personal information, and we are GDPR compliant.

---

Reorder(able) Labels was built by [Sašo Jakljevič, Playground Studio](https://www.sasojakljevic.com/ "‌") in Slovenia, EU

old.name: Write user stories for MVP features

card.name: Write user stories

old.desc:
### **US-001: Onboarding – Create Account**

- **As a new user, I want to create an account (email or social login), so that I can save my progress.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can sign up with email & password.**
  - **User can log in/out successfully.**
  - **Password reset available.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-002: Home Screen – Daily Overview**

- **As a user, I want to see my daily workout and nutrition summary on the home screen, so that I know what to focus on today.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Displays today’s planned workout.**
  - **Displays calories/macros summary (from logged food).**
  - **Shows motivational tip or AI suggestion.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-003: Log a Workout**

- **As a user, I want to log my workout (exercise, sets, reps, weight), so that I can track my training history.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Can add an exercise from a list.**
  - **Can enter sets/reps/weight.**
  - **Data is saved and viewable later.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-004: Log a Meal**

- **As a user, I want to log my meals/macros, so that I can track nutrition against my goals.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can input basic foods manually (no need for full database MVP).**
  - **Shows daily calorie & macro totals.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-005: AI Coach Interaction**

- **As a user, I want to interact with an AI “coach sphere,” so that I can ask questions and get guidance.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Sphere is visible on home screen.**
  - **User can tap it to ask a question (text input).**
  - **AI responds with short actionable advice.**
- **Priority: Medium-High**

---

### **US-006: Progress Tracking**

- **As a user, I want to see my progress (weight lifted, workouts completed, calories logged), so that I can stay motivated.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Weekly summary screen (basic charts).**
  - **Key metrics: workouts done, avg volume, calories trend.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-007: Settings / Profile**

- **As a user, I want to set my goals (cutting, bulking, maintenance)**
  **and provide personal details (energy levels, menstruation cycle if applicable),**
  **so that recommendations align with my target and daily condition.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - User can update profile (height, weight, goal).
  - User can log or select current energy level (e.g., low / normal / high).
  - Female users can optionally input menstruation cycle info.
  - AI coach tailors feedback and recommendations based on profile, energy, and cycle data.
- **Priority: Low-Medium**

card.desc:
### **US-001: Onboarding – Create Account**

- **As a new user, I want to create an account (email or social login), so that I can save my progress.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can sign up with email & password.**
  - **User can log in/out successfully.**
  - **Password reset available.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-002: Home Screen – Daily Overview**

- **As a user, I want to see my daily workout and nutrition summary on the home screen, so that I know what to focus on today.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Displays today’s planned workout.**
  - **Displays calories/macros summary (from logged food).**
  - **Shows motivational tip or AI suggestion.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-003: Log a Workout**

- **As a user, I want to log my workout (exercise, sets, reps, weight), so that I can track my training history.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Can add an exercise from a list.**
  - **Can enter sets/reps/weight.**
  - **Data is saved and viewable later.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-004: Log a Meal**

- **As a user, I want to log my meals/macros, so that I can track nutrition against my goals.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can input basic foods manually (no need for full database MVP).**
  - **Shows daily calorie & macro totals.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-005: AI Coach Interaction**

- **As a user, I want to interact with an AI “coach sphere,” so that I can ask questions and get guidance.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Sphere is visible on home screen.**
  - **User can tap it to ask a question (text input).**
  - **AI responds with short actionable advice.**
- **Priority: Medium-High**

---

### **US-006: Progress Tracking**

- **As a user, I want to see my progress (weight lifted, workouts completed, calories logged), so that I can stay motivated.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Weekly summary screen (basic charts).**
  - **Key metrics: workouts done, avg volume, calories trend.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-007: Settings/Profile – Core Info**

- **As a user, I want to set my core profile information (height, weight, and fitness goals), so that recommendations align with my target.**
- **Acceptance Criteria**
  - **User can update profile with:**
    - **Height**
    - **Weight**
    - **Goal (cutting, bulking, maintenance)**
    - **Unit preference (kg/cm or lbs/in)**
  - **AI coach tailors recommendations to this information.**
  - **Profile can be edited later in settings.**
- **Priority: Low-Medium (MVP required, but not first screen)**

---

### **US-008: Wellness Tracking – Energy & Menstrual Cycle**

- **As a user, I want to log my daily energy level and, if applicable, my menstrual cycle, so that the AI coach can adjust recommendations to my current condition.**
- **Acceptance Criteria**
  - **User can optionally log:**
    - **Energy level (e.g., scale or slider: low → medium → high).**
    - **Menstrual cycle phase (if applicable).**
  - **AI coach acknowledges this data in feedback (e.g., adjusts workout intensity or nutrition advice).**
  - **Logging is optional and not required for app use.**
  - **Data is visible in a simple history view (trend line or calendar).**
- **Priority: Future / Differentiator (not MVP scope, backlog item)**

- **As a new user, I want to create an account (email or social login), so that I can save my progress.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can sign up with email & password.**
  - **User can log in/out successfully.**
  - **Password reset available.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-002: Home Screen – Daily Overview**

- **As a user, I want to see my daily workout and nutrition summary on the home screen, so that I know what to focus on today.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Displays today’s planned workout.**
  - **Displays calories/macros summary (from logged food).**
  - **Shows motivational tip or AI suggestion.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-003: Log a Workout**

- **As a user, I want to log my workout (exercise, sets, reps, weight), so that I can track my training history.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Can add an exercise from a list.**
  - **Can enter sets/reps/weight.**
  - **Data is saved and viewable later.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-004: Log a Meal**

- **As a user, I want to log my meals/macros, so that I can track nutrition against my goals.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can input basic foods manually (no need for full database MVP).**
  - **Shows daily calorie & macro totals.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-005: AI Coach Interaction**

- **As a user, I want to interact with an AI “coach sphere,” so that I can ask questions and get guidance.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Sphere is visible on home screen.**
  - **User can tap it to ask a question (text input).**
  - **AI responds with short actionable advice.**
- **Priority: Medium-High**

---

### **US-006: Progress Tracking**

- **As a user, I want to see my progress (weight lifted, workouts completed, calories logged), so that I can stay motivated.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Weekly summary screen (basic charts).**
  - **Key metrics: workouts done, avg volume, calories trend.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-007: Settings / Profile**

- **As a user, I want to set my goals (cutting, bulking, maintenance), so that recommendations align with my target.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can update profile (height, weight, goal).**
  - **AI coach tailors feedback to this info.**
- **Priority: Low-Medium**

- **As a new user, I want to create an account (email or social login), so that I can save my progress.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**

  - **User can log in/out successfully.**
  - **Password reset available.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-002: Home Screen – Daily Overview**

- **As a user, I want to see my daily workout and nutrition summary on the home screen, so that I know what to focus on today.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Displays today’s planned workout.**
  - **Displays calories/macros summary (from logged food).**
  - **Shows motivational tip or AI suggestion.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-003: Log a Workout**

- **As a user, I want to log my workout (exercise, sets, reps, weight), so that I can track my training history.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Can add an exercise from a list.**
  - **Can enter sets/reps/weight.**
  - **Data is saved and viewable later.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-004: Log a Meal**

- **As a user, I want to log my meals/macros, so that I can track nutrition against my goals.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can input basic foods manually (no need for full database MVP).**
  - **Shows daily calorie & macro totals.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-005: AI Coach Interaction**

- **As a user, I want to interact with an AI “coach sphere,” so that I can ask questions and get guidance.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Sphere is visible on home screen.**
  - **User can tap it to ask a question (text input).**
  - **AI responds with short actionable advice.**
- **Priority: Medium-High**

---

### **US-006: Progress Tracking**

- **As a user, I want to see my progress (weight lifted, workouts completed, calories logged), so that I can stay motivated.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Weekly summary screen (basic charts).**
  - **Key metrics: workouts done, avg volume, calories trend.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-007: Settings / Profile**

- **As a user, I want to set my goals (cutting, bulking, maintenance)**
  **and provide personal details (energy levels, menstruation cycle if applicable),**
  **so that recommendations align with my target and daily condition.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - User can update profile (height, weight, goal).
  - User can log or select current energy level (e.g., low / normal / high).
  - Female users can optionally input menstruation cycle info.
  - AI coach tailors feedback and recommendations based on profile, energy, and cycle data.
- **Priority: Low-Medium**

cards.desc:
**With Trello and Jira together, you can accomplish anything with cross-functional teams.**

Love the ease of Trello but looking for project management features for your cross-functional teams? Check out **Jira**!

Jira combines powerful features _(subtasks, reporting, and more!)_ with an easy-to-use interface. Because it’s brought to you by the same company as Trello, it will also integrate with your Trello board through **Jira lists**, letting you manage your work wherever feels right to you.

### Curious? [Try Jira now](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira "‌")

cards.desc:
### **US-001: Onboarding – Create Account**

- **As a new user, I want to create an account (email or social login), so that I can save my progress.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can sign up with email & password.**
  - **User can log in/out successfully.**
  - **Password reset available.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-002: Home Screen – Daily Overview**

- **As a user, I want to see my daily workout and nutrition summary on the home screen, so that I know what to focus on today.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Displays today’s planned workout.**
  - **Displays calories/macros summary (from logged food).**
  - **Shows motivational tip or AI suggestion.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-003: Log a Workout**

- **As a user, I want to log my workout (exercise, sets, reps, weight), so that I can track my training history.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Can add an exercise from a list.**
  - **Can enter sets/reps/weight.**
  - **Data is saved and viewable later.**
- **Priority: High**

---

### **US-004: Log a Meal**

- **As a user, I want to log my meals/macros, so that I can track nutrition against my goals.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **User can input basic foods manually (no need for full database MVP).**
  - **Shows daily calorie & macro totals.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-005: AI Coach Interaction**

- **As a user, I want to interact with an AI “coach sphere,” so that I can ask questions and get guidance.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Sphere is visible on home screen.**
  - **User can tap it to ask a question (text input).**
  - **AI responds with short actionable advice.**
- **Priority: Medium-High**

---

### **US-006: Progress Tracking**

- **As a user, I want to see my progress (weight lifted, workouts completed, calories logged), so that I can stay motivated.**
- **Acceptance Criteria:**
  - **Weekly summary screen (basic charts).**
  - **Key metrics: workouts done, avg volume, calories trend.**
- **Priority: Medium**

---

### **US-007: Settings/Profile – Core Info**

- **As a user, I want to set my core profile information (height, weight, and fitness goals), so that recommendations align with my target.**
- **Acceptance Criteria**
  - **User can update profile with:**
    - **Height**
    - **Weight**
    - **Goal (cutting, bulking, maintenance)**
    - **Unit preference (kg/cm or lbs/in)**
  - **AI coach tailors recommendations to this information.**
  - **Profile can be edited later in settings.**
- **Priority: Low-Medium (MVP required, but not first screen)**

---

### **US-008: Wellness Tracking – Energy & Menstrual Cycle**

- **As a user, I want to log my daily energy level and, if applicable, my menstrual cycle, so that the AI coach can adjust recommendations to my current condition.**
- **Acceptance Criteria**
  - **User can optionally log:**
    - **Energy level (e.g., scale or slider: low → medium → high).**
    - **Menstrual cycle phase (if applicable).**
  - **AI coach acknowledges this data in feedback (e.g., adjusts workout intensity or nutrition advice).**
  - **Logging is optional and not required for app use.**
  - **Data is visible in a simple history view (trend line or calendar).**
- **Priority: Future / Differentiator (not MVP scope, backlog item)**
